column2:
NOUN

informal
A lazy person who stays in bed late.  
‘I was awake at 6: 00 a.m. while the hardened __s wanted to sleep the day away.’

NOUN

1A small piece of tasty food.
‘when you are out with your puppy always have a ___ in your pocket’  
1.1A small and particularly interesting item of gossip or information.
‘they were hoping for __s about the family’

NOUN

mass noun
Time spent recovering from an illness or medical treatment; recuperation.
‘a period of ___’
count noun ‘I had a long ___ ahead’

VERB

[NO OBJECT]
1(chiefly of large mammals) roll about or lie in mud or water, especially to keep cool or avoid biting insects.
‘there were watering places where buffalo liked to ___’
2 ___ in(of a person) indulge in an unrestrained way in (something that one finds pleasurable)
‘I was __ing in the luxury of the hotel’

NOUN

mass noun
Vigour and spirit or enthusiasm.
‘Kollo sings with supreme ___ and flexibility’
